EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to notify CART Coordinator when Drug Product Delivered
EmailTemplate.name: NotifyCARTCoordinatorWhenDrugProductDelivered
EmailTemplate.subject: {!$Label.ProductName} - Drug Product Delivered for {!Order__c.PatientID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Order__c.Coordinator__c},
Your patient's (Patient ID: {!Order__c.PatientID__c}) drug product has been delivered. If available, please provide their infusion date details.
If you have any questions in the interim, please reach out to us via +1-XXX-XXX-XXXX
Thank You, {!$Label.JanssenBiotechAndLegendBiotech}
